attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
consider rebate on council tax for a Plumbing courses, which has been refused for a full-time vocational course.

Reasons given are illogical and unfair:
a)  not higher education
b) not in a prescribed educational establishment
c) not an apprenticeship(though it may lead to one and  it certainly leads to employment
d) It is part-correspondence course(with 6 weeks in the college workshops)  - 
 - 
1. The only  relevant criterion is that I am a full-time student 
2. The Plumbing course is being run by the UK’s largest Distance Learning Organisation, Train 4 Trade Skills, with 50 years continuous operation, with access to loan free tuition grants. 
3. In these times of hardship, this refusal to encourage retraining in a trade while, for example, helping in an MA in Creative writing,seems typical of government’s failure to help those in most need.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
